channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell Power Manager (DPM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell Power Manager (DPM)

item.title: CVE-2023-32450|2024-10-15T15:39:49.985Z -- dell -- dell%20power%20manager%20%28dpm%29
item.description: Dell Power Manager, Versions 3.3 to 3.14 contains an Improper Access Control vulnerability. A low-privileged malicious user may potentially exploit this vulnerability to perform arbitrary code execution with limited access.

item.title: CVE-2024-39576|2024-08-22T13:39:02.079Z -- dell -- dell%20power%20manager%20%28dpm%29
item.description: Dell Power Manager (DPM), versions 3.15.0 and prior, contains an Incorrect Privilege Assignment vulnerability. A low privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution and Elevation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-39576|2024-08-22T02:54:05.865Z -- dell -- dell%20power%20manager%20%28dpm%29
item.description: Dell Power Manager (DPM), versions 3.15.0 and prior, contains an Incorrect Privilege Assignment vulnerability. A low privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution and Elevation of privileges.
